verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> also said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> unto Saul אֹתִ֨י <WH853> שָׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD לִמְשָׁחֳךָ֣ <WH4886> me to anoint לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> thee [to be] king עַל־ <WH5921> over עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> over his people עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over Israel וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now שְׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> now therefore hearken לְק֖וֹל <WH6963> thou unto the voice דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the words יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts פָּקַ֕דְתִּי <WH6485> I remember אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> did עֲמָלֵ֖ק <WH6002> [that] which Amalek לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> to Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> how שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> how he laid לוֹ֙ בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> [wait] for him in the way בַּעֲלֹת֖וֹ <WH5927> when he came up מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> from Egypt

עַתָּה֩ <WH6258> Now לֵ֨ךְ <WH1980> go וְהִכִּֽיתָ֜ה <WH5221> and smite אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָלֵ֗ק <WH6002> Amalek וְהַֽחֲרַמְתֶּם֙ <WH2763> and utterly destroy אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תַחְמֹ֖ל <WH2550> all that they have and spare עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> but וְהֵמַתָּ֞ה <WH4191> them not but slay מֵאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> both man עַד־ <WH5704> against אִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> and woman מֵֽעֹלֵל֙ <WH5768> infant וְעַד־ <WH5704> against יוֹנֵ֔ק <WH3243> and suckling מִשּׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> ox וְעַד־ <WH5704> against שֶׂ֔ה <WH7716> and sheep מִגָּמָ֖ל <WH1581> camel וְעַד־ <WH5704> against חֲמֽוֹר׃ <WH2543> and ass ס

וַיְשַׁמַּ֤ע <WH8085> together שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> And Saul אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people וַֽיִּפְקְדֵם֙ <WH6485> and numbered בַּטְּלָאִ֔ים <WH2923> them in Telaim מָאתַ֥יִם <WH3967> two hundred אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand רַגְלִ֑י <WH7273> footmen וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> and ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand אֶת־ <WH853> אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> men יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah
וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> And Saul עַד־ <WH5704> against עִ֣יר <WH5892> to a city עֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> of Amalek וַיָּ֖רֶב <WH7378> adversary בַּנָּֽחַל׃ <WH5158> in the valley

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הַקֵּינִ֡י <WH7017> unto the Kenites לְכוּ֩ <WH1980> Go סֻּ֨רוּ <WH5493> depart רְד֜וּ <WH3381> get you down מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> from among עֲמָלֵקִ֗י <WH6003> the Amalekites פֶּן־ <WH6435> not אֹֽסִפְךָ֙ <WH622> lest I destroy עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you עָשִׂ֤יתָה <WH6213> you with them for ye shewed חֶ֙סֶד֙ <WH2617> kindness עִם־ <WH5973> with כָּל־ <WH3605> to all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> to all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּעֲלוֹתָ֖ם <WH5927> when they came up מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וַיָּ֥סַר <WH5493> departed קֵינִ֖י <WH7017> So the Kenites מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> from among עֲמָלֵֽק׃ <WH6002> the Amalekites

וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> smote שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> the Amalekites מֵֽחֲוִילָה֙ <WH2341> from Havilah בּוֹאֲךָ֣ <WH935> [until] thou comest שׁ֔וּר <WH7793> to Shur אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [is] over against מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> Egypt

וַיִּתְפֹּ֛שׂ <WH8610> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> אֲגַ֥ג <WH90> Agag מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king עֲמָלֵ֖ק <WH6002> of the Amalekites חָ֑י <WH2416> alive וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> all the people הֶחֱרִ֥ים <WH2763> and utterly destroyed לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> of the sword

וַיַּחְמֹל֩ <WH2550> spared שָׁא֨וּל <WH7586> But Saul וְהָעָ֜ם <WH5971> and the people עַל־ <WH5921> and אֲגָ֗ג <WH90> Agag וְעַל־ <WH5921> and מֵיטַ֣ב <WH4315> and the best הַצֹּאן֩ <WH6629> of the sheep וְהַבָּקָ֨ר <WH1241> and of the oxen וְהַמִּשְׁנִ֤ים <WH4932> and of the fatlings וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הַכָּרִים֙ <WH3733> and the lambs וְעַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַטּ֔וֹב <WH2896> and all [that was] good וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and were not אָב֖וּ <WH14> and would הַחֲרִימָ֑ם <WH2763> not utterly destroy וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַמְּלָאכָ֛ה <WH4399> them but every thing נְמִבְזָ֥ה <WH959> despised וְנָמֵ֖ס <WH4549> and refuse אֹתָ֥הּ <WH853> הֶחֱרִֽימוּ׃ <WH2763> that they destroyed utterly פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> unto Samuel לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

נִחַ֗מְתִּי <WH5162> It repenteth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִמְלַ֤כְתִּי <WH4427> me that I have set up אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> Saul לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> [to be] king כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁב֙ <WH7725> for he is turned back מֵאַֽחֲרַ֔י <WH310> from following וְאֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרַ֖י <WH1697> my commandments לֹ֣א <WH3808> not הֵקִ֑ים <WH6965> me and hath not performed וַיִּ֙חַר֙ <WH2734> And it grieved לִשְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> Samuel וַיִּזְעַ֥ק <WH2199> and he cried אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> all night

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֧ם <WH7925> rose early שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <WH8050> And when Samuel לִקְרַ֥את <WH7122> to meet שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיֻּגַּ֨ד <WH5046> it was told לִשְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <WH8050> Samuel לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying בָּֽא־ <WH935> came שָׁא֤וּל <WH7586> Saul הַכַּרְמֶ֙לָה֙ <WH3760> to Carmel וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold מַצִּ֥יב <WH5324> and behold he set him up לוֹ֙ יָ֔ד <WH3027> a place וַיִּסֹּב֙ <WH5437> and is gone about וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֔ר <WH5674> and passed on וַיֵּ֖רֶד <WH3381> and gone down הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <WH1537> to Gilgal

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> to Saul וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said ל֣וֹ שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> and Saul בָּר֤וּךְ <WH1288> unto him Blessed אַתָּה֙ <WH859> are you לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [be] thou of the LORD הֲקִימֹ֖תִי <WH6965> I have performed אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> the commandment יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> And Samuel וּמֶ֛ה <WH4100> What קֽוֹל־ <WH6963> What [meaneth] then this bleating הַצֹּ֥אן <WH6629> of the sheep הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> is this בְּאָזְנָ֑י <WH241> in mine ears וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the lowing הַבָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> of the oxen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I שֹׁמֵֽעַ׃ <WH8085> which I hear

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> And Saul מֵעֲמָלֵקִ֣י <WH6003> them from the Amalekites הֱבִיא֗וּם <WH935> They have brought אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after חָמַ֤ל <WH2550> spared הָעָם֙ <WH5971> for the people עַל־ <WH5921> and מֵיטַ֤ב <WH4315> the best הַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> of the sheep וְהַבָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> and of the oxen לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of זְבֹ֖חַ <WH2076> to sacrifice לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיּוֹתֵ֖ר <WH3498> and the rest הֶחֱרַֽמְנוּ׃ <WH2763> we have utterly destroyed ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> Then Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> unto Saul הֶ֚רֶף <WH7503> Stay וְאַגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> and I will tell לְּךָ֔ אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> thee what the LORD אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> to me this night [וַיֹּאמְרוּ כ] (וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said ק) ל֖וֹ דַּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> unto him Say on ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> And Samuel הֲל֗וֹא <WH3808> not אִם־ <WH518> though קָטֹ֤ן <WH6996> When thou [wast] little אַתָּה֙ <WH859> your own בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> in thine own sight רֹ֛אשׁ <WH7218> [wast] thou not [made] the head שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you וַיִּמְשָׁחֲךָ֧ <WH4886> anointed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> thee king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיִּשְׁלָחֲךָ֥ <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD בְּדָ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> thee on a journey וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go וְהַחֲרַמְתָּ֞ה <WH2763> and utterly destroy אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחַטָּאִים֙ <WH2400> the sinners אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָלֵ֔ק <WH6002> the Amalekites וְנִלְחַמְתָּ֣ <WH3898> and fight ב֔וֹ עַ֥ד <WH5704> until כַּלּוֹתָ֖ם <WH3615> against them until they be consumed אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְלָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why לֹא־ <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <WH8085> Wherefore then didst thou not obey בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַתַּ֙עַט֙ <WH5860> but didst fly אֶל־ <WH413> upon הַשָּׁלָ֔ל <WH7998> upon the spoil וַתַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and didst הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> unto Samuel אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> Yea I have obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וָאֵלֵ֕ךְ <WH1980> and went בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> which the LORD וָאָבִ֗יא <WH935> me and have brought אֶת־ <WH853> אֲגַג֙ <WH90> Agag מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king עֲמָלֵ֔ק <WH6002> of Amalek וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָלֵ֖ק <WH6002> the Amalekites הֶחֱרַֽמְתִּי׃ <WH2763> and have utterly destroyed

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took הָעָ֧ם <WH5971> But the people מֵהַשָּׁלָ֛ל <WH7998> of the spoil צֹ֥אן <WH6629> sheep וּבָקָ֖ר <WH1241> and oxen רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> the chief הַחֵ֑רֶם <WH2764> of the things which should have been utterly destroyed לִזְבֹּ֛חַ <WH2076> to sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God בַּגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <WH1537> in Gilgal

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> And Samuel הַחֵ֤פֶץ <WH2656> [as great] delight לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> Hath the LORD בְּעֹל֣וֹת <WH5930> in burnt offerings וּזְבָחִ֔ים <WH2077> and sacrifices כִּשְׁמֹ֖עַ <WH8085> as in obeying בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> has the LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold שְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> to obey מִזֶּ֣בַח <WH2077> than sacrifice ט֔וֹב <WH2896> [is] better לְהַקְשִׁ֖יב <WH7181> [and] to hearken מֵחֵ֥לֶב <WH2459> than the fat אֵילִֽים׃ <WH352> of rams

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for חַטַּאת־ <WH2403> [is as] the sin קֶ֙סֶם֙ <WH7081> of witchcraft מֶ֔רִי <WH4805> For rebellion וְאָ֥וֶן <WH205> [is as] iniquity וּתְרָפִ֖ים <WH8655> and idolatry הַפְצַ֑ר <WH6484> and stubbornness יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Because מָאַ֙סְתָּ֙ <WH3988> Because thou hast rejected אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּמְאָסְךָ֖ <WH3988> he hath also rejected מִמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> thee from [being] king ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֤וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> unto Samuel חָטָ֔אתִי <WH2398> I have sinned כִּֽי־ <WH3588> have indeed עָבַ֥רְתִּי <WH5674> for I have transgressed אֶת־ <WH853> פִּֽי־ <WH6310> the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרֶ֑יךָ <WH1697> and thy words כִּ֤י <WH3588> because יָרֵ֙אתִי֙ <WH3372> because I feared אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people וָאֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> and obeyed בְּקוֹלָֽם׃ <WH6963> their voice

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now שָׂ֥א <WH5375> Now therefore I pray thee pardon נָ֖א <WH4994> please אֶת־ <WH853> חַטָּאתִ֑י <WH2403> my sin וְשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> and turn again עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> with וְאֶֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <WH7812> with me that I may worship לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
